means: 在内部、内在化或私人化的性质或状态

sentence.Network_en: The radical interiority of the building folds inwards all views.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个建筑的所有可视面都向内.

sentence.Network_en: It is good as far as the mundane world isconcerned, but good asas your interiority isconcerned.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些东西,对世俗世界而言是有益的, 但对你的内在生命而言毫无用处.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 它没有内在性(interiority)，而得以在外在元素中自由运动，它不依赖同一性，驾驭著差异的烈马在旷野上任意驰骋，它不尊崇人为划分 …
方法派主张，内在化(interiority)与本质化(inwardness)作为创造性的工具，是演员对演出的明确主题和意义进行精神性探索的一部分。
...nderwritten)的角色——没有自由意志，连内心世界(interiority)也没有。
现在这个观念建议自我把内部性(interiority)本身理解为一种超越的限定。无论如何，只有内部变成某种外部的显现，与超越者的不发问(…

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from medieval Latin interioritas, from Latin interior 'inner'

auth_sentence.content: That means pulling inside himself, getting this interiority he has been missing.
auth_sentence.res_content: That means pulling inside himself, getting this interiority he has been missing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That means pulling inside himself, getting this interiority he has been missing.

auth_sentence.content: But Kendall had his doubts as to whether their home achieved an authentic state of interiority.
auth_sentence.res_content: But Kendall had his doubts as to whether their home achieved an authentic state of interiority.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But Kendall had his doubts as to whether their home achieved an authentic state of interiority.

auth_sentence.content: "I chose to change my exteriority to bring it closer into alignment with my interiority," she told me.
